dct_title_s: Map of the routes in Eastern Africa between Zanzibar, the Great Lakes and the Nile
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "geographical miles" and "English stat. miles".
Shows topography, drainage, islands off coast, islands in Lake Victoria, hot springs, palaces.
Features caravan routes and tribal territories.
Descriptive text throughout and below title in top right corner.
From J. Murray's Journal of the Royal Geographical Society, London, 1864.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
